Description: Handle sliver of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora from neck join to sharp turn. Clay fine buff. Rectangular stamp.
Production date: 124 BC (see N. Badoud, Le temps de Rhodes, 2015, 143.)
Curator's comments: Name Teisamenos. Probably from same die as a stamp from Akko in the online Alexandria catalogue, where the supplemented reading has the iota of epi omitted and the full spelling Teis-, not Tis-; certainly there is no room for the full spelling of both words. Trimmed.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.1243)
